LanguageData.VFEI_BeastHunted.stages.0.label: Successful hunt!
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.0.label: Restless (x0)
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.0.descripti: We should begin planning our next raid.
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.1.label: Restless (x1)
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.1.descripti: Traveling should be easy now, we can easily loot from those weaklings.
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.2.label: Restless (x2)
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.2.descripti: Why is our warband growing so docile? The weak should fear the strong - We must attack our enemies soon.
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.3.label: Restless (x3)
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.3.descripti: So many luxuries at our fingertips, yet we’re too cowardly to slaughter our enemies and take their riches?
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.4.label: Restless (x4)
LanguageData.VFEV_RaidRestlessness.stages.4.descripti: I’ve lost all hope - There is no way we can keep going like this, I fear our people and history will never be remembered.
LanguageData.VFEV_StingMoodDebuff.stages.0.label: Stung by bees
LanguageData.VFEV_StingMoodDebuff.stages.0.descriptio: I was stung, and it hurt!
LanguageData.VFEV_BeastHunted.stages.0.label: Successful hunt!
LanguageData.VFEV_AttendedFeast.stages.0.label: Attended feast
LanguageData.VFEV_AttendedFeast.stages.0.description: I had an amazing time at the feast!
LanguageData.VFEV_TakingPartInFeast.stages.0.label: I am taking part in a feast
LanguageData.VFEV_TakingPartInFeast.stages.0.descript: I have a good time at the feast!
